value.string:
<tal:block define="dummy python: request.RESPONSE.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/css;; charset=utf-8')"/>
 
 /* ## home banner #################################### start ## */
 
 .homebanner {
 
 	background: url(../community_img/homebanner.jpg) no-repeat transparent;
 	color:#fff;
 	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #006686;
 
 }
 
 .homebanner h2 {
 
 	text-shadow: 0 3px 0 #0d7dab;
 
 }
 
 .homebanner ul li {
 	
 	list-style-image: none;
 	list-style-type: none;
 	background: url(../community_img/bannerbullet.png) no-repeat transparent;
 
 }
 
 .button-why:link, .button-why:active, .button-why:visited {
 
 	background: url(../community_img/bannerbuttons.png) no-repeat transparent;
 
 }
 .button-why:hover {
 
 	background-position: 0 100%;
 
 }
 
 .button-try:link, .button-try:active, .button-try:visited {
 
 	background: url(../community_img/bannerbuttons.png) no-repeat transparent;
 	background-position: -158px 0;
 
 }
 .button-try:hover {
 
 	background-position: -158px 100%;
 
 }
 
 /* ## home banner ##################################### end ### */
 
 
 
 /* ## home banner #################################### start ## */
 
 .homebanner {
 
 	display: block;
 	width: 924px;
 	height: 283px;
 margin:0 14px 10px;
 
 }
 
 .homebanner h2 {
 
 	padding:25px;
 	margin:0;
 
 }
 
 .homebanner h4 {
 
 	position: absolute;
 	bottom: 20px;
 	right:25px;
 	padding:0;
 	margin:0;
 
 }
 
 .homebanner img {
 
 	position: absolute;
 	top: 89px;
 	right:1px;
 
 }
 
 .homebanner ul {
 
 	position: absolute;
 	top:101px;
 	left:5px;
 	margin:0;
 	padding:0 30px;
 	width: 200px;
 
 }
 
 .homebanner ul li {
 
 	margin:0;
 	padding: 7px 10px 7px 30px;
 	display: block;
 	
 }
 
 .button-why:link, .button-why:active, .button-why:visited, .button-try:link, .button-try:active, .button-try:visited {
 
 	width:158px;
 	height:47px;
 	display: block;
 	position: absolute;
 	bottom:0;
 	left:25px;
 	text-indent: -999999px;
 
 }
 
 .button-try:link, .button-try:active, .button-try:visited {
 
 	left: 180px;
 
 }
 
 
 
 
 
 /* ## home banner ##################################### end ### */
